title: "Inventorship and Patentability of Artificial Intelligence-Based Inventions"
excerpt: "The quandary is whether an AI platform that assists in creating an invention should be named as an inventor in a patent. For example, an AI-powered system may be employed pharmaceutically to identify molecular compounds in the discovery of a newly invented drug,"
